name: create-precast-app
description: CLI tool to scaffold modern web applications with your chosen stack

scripts.build: tsup && cp -r src/templates dist/ && pnpm run audit:fix
scripts.audit:fix: (pnpm audit --audit-level=moderate 2>/dev/null || echo 'Audit check skipped in CI environment') || true
scripts.update:templates: pnpm run src/scripts/update-template-deps.ts && pnpm run build
scripts.build:test: pnpm run build && tsup test-runner.ts --format esm --clean --out-dir dist-test
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Build should be done before publishing'
scripts.prepack: echo 'Build should be done before packing'
scripts.publish:beta: pnpm run build && pnpm version prerelease --preid=beta && pnpm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish
scripts.publish:major: pnpm run build && pnpm version major && pnpm publish
scripts.publish:dry: echo 'Use: pnpm publish --dry-run (after ensuring node is in PATH)'
scripts.pack:test: echo 'Files that will be published:' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'Plus: README.md, CHANGELOG.md, LICENSE, package.json'
scripts.publish:check: pnpm run build && echo 'Ready for publishing!'
